com.thomsonreuters.upa.valueadd.domainrep.rdm.directory

Interface DirectoryRefresh

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DirectoryMsg, MsgBase

    public interface DirectoryRefresh
extends DirectoryMsg
    The RDM Directory Refresh. Used by an OMM Provider to provide information about available services.
    See Also:
    DirectoryMsg, ServiceImpl
